SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
BonusReward
Entity used to encode all information regarding the bonus reward, a specific type of reward which is not required to win the game, but increases the final score of the player.
CollisionDetector
Contains logic for checking and detecting collisions between player and tiles as well as player and immovable objects.
Enemy
The type Enemy.
GameOverMenu
 
GameRunner
Class that contains main() method for our game.
ImmovableObject
Abstract class representing any object on the screen that is static, including carrots, mystical ocean fruits, and lava tiles.
ImmovableObjectDisplay
Contains all logic to display carrots, mystical ocean fruit, and lava tiles to screen.
KeyHandler
Takes user input in order to facilitate movement of the main character.
MainCharacter
Entity used to encode all information on our game's main character, controlled by the player: a turtle trying to reach the ocean.
Menu
 
MenuLogic
 
MovableObject
Abstract class representing any object on the screen that can move, like the main character and enemy objects.
PathFinder
The type Path finder.
Punishment
Entity encoding information on game punishments: lava tiles which cause the player to lose points and return to the starting position when touched.
RegularReward
Entity encoding information on game punishments: carrots which grant the player points.
Screen
Contains general game logic, including main game loop, asset drawing, and updating of movable and immovable objects.
Tile
Entity encoding information on game tiles which make up the board that the game takes place on.
TileManager
Contains all logic create a board of tiles and display them to the screen.
WinningMenu
